title: Turner is bullish on long pig
author: VD
content_html:
Although he clearly doesn’t understand what plants do in greenhouses:

On not taking drastic action to correct global warming: “Not doing it will be catastrophic. We’ll be eight degrees hottest in ten, not ten but 30 or 40 years and basically none of the crops will grow. Most of the people will have died and the rest of us will be cannibals.”

I’d bet Ted Turner that in ten years, the Earth will probably be colder than it is now, it certainly won’t be the 2.65 degrees warmer it would have to be to be 8 degrees warmer in 30 years. “Global Warming” is unscience, it’s nothing more than bad software design and badly flawed computer modeling. But you’d think he would understand that plants tend to grow very well in greenhouses. Hence the name.

Turner hungers after one-world government, so this “WAAAHHHHHH WE WILL ALL BE CANNIBALS” nonsense is just emo-screeching in order to try scare the stupid into supporting it. It’s one of the most encouraging things I’ve seen from the global warming alarmists in some time, as they are clearly panicking over the way in which their alarmism has totally failed to gain any traction except among the silly science fetish crowd.
